author: reselbob
content: Hi, new to this server. I am trying to learn about how the Ethereum website renders the documentation that is created and stored in GitHub. I am very much interested in the binding mechanism in play. Any help will be greatly appreciated. If this is the wrong place to make such a post, please let me know.

author: doxos9414
content: Hi folks! I have some pressing questions about oracles and why they're necessary... I have my doubts about them. Is there a particular room that is best to discuss this topic?
